alert.note: Alert for Tusas Mountains Including Chama (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 10 at 3:13AM MST until March 11 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations 4 to 10 inches possible with locally higher amounts above 8,500. Winds could gust as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Tusas Mountains Including Chama. * WHEN...From this evening through Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Some roads may be closed, especially U.S. Highway 64 between Tres Piedras and Tierra Amarilla.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
